issue.title: Extraction REST Service does not encode special chars
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Special Chars are never encoded by REST service, and XML output may fail.
Same problem as #852 using createElementNS with value.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Fix: 
* "Wrong Document Error", on getException the response document is not the same, use @$parent->ownerDocument->...@
* And add verbosity to XML errors
Rev. 9409
